Package com.accenture.adf.newcodington.module18.sample

Class Summary
ConsoleIO Topic: Reading from the Keyboard and Writing to the Console Description: Wrapping System.in with an instance of InputStreamReader allows us to read the entries as characters and wrapping the InputStreamReader with a BufferedReader allows the reading and buffering of multiple characters and lines of text.
DeserialFile Topic: Demo how to read Person data from the DAT file Instructions: 1.
DeserialFileDemo Topic: Demo serialzing and deserializing a Person object Instructions: Read Person data from the DAT file 1.
Person Person class is a Serializable class holding person related data
SerialFile Topic: Demo serialzing and deserializing a Person object Instructions: Store the Person data into a .dat file 1.
SerialFileDemo Topic: Demo serialzing and deserializing a Person object Instructions: Store the Person data into a .dat file 1.
